subject: Implement framework alignment: Layer 1, 2, 3 structure and UI
body:
Major Changes:
- Added Layer 1 (Core Function Categories): 10 software categories with pricing contexts
- Added Layer 2 (Delivery Mechanisms): 5 delivery options with modifiers
- Added Layer 3 (Service Models): 4 service levels with impact metrics
- Redesigned UI with 4-step flow: Category → Models → Delivery/Service → Inputs
- Implemented category-based model filtering with context-specific pricing hints
- Added event handlers for category selection and Layer 2/3 options

Data Structures:
- LAYER_1_CATEGORIES: 10 categories including dev-devops, business-ops, marketing, etc.
- LAYER_2_DELIVERY: cloud-saas, self-hosted, hybrid, mobile, api-embedded
- LAYER_3_SERVICE: self-service, managed-services, professional-services, hybrid-modular
- Helper functions for applying delivery and service modifiers

UI Updates:
- Step 1: Category selector with description and examples
- Step 2: Filtered model checkboxes with category-specific pricing ranges
- Step 3: Radio buttons for delivery mechanism and service model
- Step 4: Model-specific inputs (existing functionality)

Next Steps:
- Apply Layer 2/3 modifiers in calculation engine
- Update input forms with category-specific defaults
- Add industry benchmark displays
- Test complete user flows
